user_query: I am a food blogger and I would like to include nutritional information in my recipes. Can you give me the nutritional analysis for 1 tablespoon of olive oil and 1 medium-sized banana using the Edamam Nutrition Analysis API? Additionally, I need guidelines for vaccinations. Can you provide me with the recommended vaccines?

TaskList.description: Perform nutritional analysis for 1 tablespoon of olive oil using the Edamam Nutrition Analysis API.
Perform nutritional analysis for 1 medium-sized banana using the Edamam Nutrition Analysis API.
Compile results from the nutritional analysis for olive oil and banana.
Retrieve guidelines for recommended vaccinations from a trusted medical source.
